entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Red Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:29 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 21.
